item.title: 实得工资再次下降，南非人倍感压力
item.description: 根据 BankservAfrica 的数据，5 月份南非人的实际收入比上月下降了 1.1%。【原文：South Africans real take-home pay declined by 1.1% in May from the previous month, according to BankservAfrica.】

item.title: 芬兰领导人敦促俄罗斯在边境附近集结时保持冷静
item.description: 芬兰总统亚历山大-斯图布（Alexander Stubb）表示，在有报道称俄罗斯在北约成员国边境附近集结军队之际，芬兰保持 "冷静和镇定"。【原文：Finland’s President Alexander Stubb said his nation remains “calm and collected” amid reports of Russian troop buildup near the NATO member’s border.】

item.title: 苹果准备对应用商店进行修改以躲避更多欧盟罚款
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监督机构在对苹果公司处以 5 亿欧元（约合 5.8 亿美元）罚款后发出了最后通牒，苹果公司准备对 App Store 进行进一步修改，以安抚欧盟反垄断监督机构。【原文：Apple Inc. is poised to offer further App Store changes to appease European Union antitrust watchdogs who issued an ultimatum after doling out a €500 million ($580 million) fine.】

item.title: 刚果与新加坡三叉戟公司签署数字身份识别协议
item.description: 刚果民主共和国与新加坡 Trident Digital Tech Holdings Ltd. 签署了一项协议，开发国家数字身份和电子政务系统。【原文：Democratic Republic of Congo signed an agreement with Trident Digital Tech Holdings Ltd. of Singapore to develop a national digital identity and e-government system.】

item.title: 特朗普政府敦促上诉法院支持关税权
item.description: 特朗普政府为总统征收大规模全球关税的权力辩护，向联邦上诉法院辩称，法院应推翻认定征税违宪的裁决。【原文：The Trump administration defended the president’s power to impose sweeping global tariffs, arguing to a federal appeals court that it should overturn a decision finding the levies unconstitutional.】

item.title: 英国电动汽车增长可能导致深夜用电量飙升
item.description: 家用汽车充电器通常在能源充足且便宜的情况下通宵供电。但随着越来越多的驾驶者使用电动汽车，这种情况将发生改变，从而打破传统的供需平衡。【原文：Home car chargers typically power up overnight when energy is plentiful and cheap. But that’s set to change as more and more drivers go electric, upending the traditional supply-demand balance.】

item.title: 中东停战后风险偏好推动非洲债券上涨
item.description: 由于投资者押注以色列和伊朗之间的停战协议将得以维持，油价下跌降低了通胀预期并提高了非洲大陆的实际利率，非洲债券正随着投资者重返高收益资产而反弹。【原文：African bonds are rallying as investors return to high-yield assets amid bets that the truce between Israel and Iran will hold, with lower oil prices cutting inflation expectations and boosting real rates on the continent.】

item.title: 荷兰极右翼领导人在北约峰会上讨好特朗普总统
item.description: 荷兰极右翼领导人 Geert Wilders 在海牙北约峰会期间会见了唐纳德-特朗普，两人讨论了 "制定更严厉的移民法的必要性"。【原文：Dutch far-right leader Geert Wilders met with Donald Trump on the sidelines of the NATO Summit in The Hague, where they discussed “the need for tougher immigration laws,” Wilders said in a post on X.】

item.title: 美国新房销售创 2022 年以来最大降幅，原因是可负担性差
item.description: 美国 5 月份新房购买量创下近三年来的最大降幅，原因是大量的销售激励措施未能缓解经济承受能力的限制。【原文：US purchases of new homes fell in May by the most in almost three years as rampant sales incentives fell short of alleviating affordability constraints.】

item.title: 据说德意志交易所将为数据部门 10 亿美元的首次公开募股增加银行参与
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，德意志交易所（Deutsche Boerse AG）在权衡是将一家私募股权公司持有的股份上市还是回购时，为其治理数据和分析部门 ISS Stoxx 可能进行的 10 亿美元首次公开募股增加了更多的银行。【原文：Deutsche Boerse AG has added more banks to a potential $1 billion initial public offering of its governance data and analytics unit ISS Stoxx, according to people familiar with the matter, as it weighs whether to list a stake held by a private equity firm or buy it back.】

item.title: 巴西央行调整外汇策略以减少掉期交易堆积
item.description: 在过去的几个月里，巴西央行在货币市场上越来越活跃，使用不同的工具进行干预，分析人士认为，这是为了最终提高雷亚尔的吸引力，减少套利交易。【原文：Brazil’s central bank has become more and more active in the currency market over the last few months, using different tools to intervene in what analysts say is a push to ultimately make the real more attractive and cut down on arbitrage trades.】

item.title: 鲍威尔讲话前，S&P 500 指数距历史纪录仅一步之遥
item.description: 随着华尔街为美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔第二天在立法者面前作证做好准备，美国股市周三走高，纳斯达克100指数创下历史收盘新高。【原文：US stocks edged higher on Wednesday following an all-time closing high for the Nasdaq 100 Index as Wall Street readied for a second day of testimony from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell before lawmakers.】

item.title: Bumble 宣布裁员 30%，同时上调季度业绩展望
item.description: 在创始人惠特尼-沃尔夫-赫德（Whitney Wolfe Herd）重返公司担任首席执行官，对这款陷入困境的约会应用进行全面改革几个月后，Bumble 公司表示将裁员近三分之一。【原文：Bumble Inc. said it’s cutting almost one-third of its staff, months after founder Whitney Wolfe Herd returned as chief executive officer to overhaul the struggling dating app.】

item.title: 美国公司支持投资 7.6 亿美元的刚果-卢旺达-布隆迪水电站
item.description: 在卢旺达和刚果民主共和国之间的鲁齐齐河（Ruzizi River）上建造一座水电站的计划拖延已久，但在美国支持下，两国之间的和平谈判得到了推动。【原文：A long-delayed plan to build a hydropower plant on the Ruzizi River between Rwanda and the Democratic Republic of Congo received a boost amid US-backed peace talks between the two countries.】

item.title: 摩根资产首席执行官警告私人信贷泡沫，吹捧高收益债务
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）首席执行官乔治-盖奇（George Gatch）表示，红火的私人信贷市场的泡沫正在为公共高收益债务领域创造机会。【原文：Froth in the red-hot private credit marketplace is creating opportunities in the world of public high-yield debt, according to George Gatch, JPMorgan Asset Management’s chief executive officer.】

item.title: Klarna 创始人的风险投资公司承诺向人工智能领域投资 3 亿欧元
item.description: 瑞典社会企业投资者诺尔斯肯风险投资公司（Norrsken VC）承诺向人工智能初创企业投资3亿欧元（约合3.48亿美元），这些企业旨在帮助解决一些气候方面最迫切的需求。【原文：Swedish impact investor Norrsken VC has pledged to invest €300 million ($348 million) in artificial intelligence startups that aim to help solve some of the climate’s most pressing needs.】

item.title: 白宫经济学家称特朗普政策将削减高达 11 万亿美元的赤字
item.description: 白宫首席经济学家称，唐纳德-特朗普总统的经济政策将在未来十年内使美国财政赤字减少多达 11 万亿美元；这一预测与独立分析不同。【原文：President Donald Trump’s economic policies will reduce US fiscal deficits by up to $11 trillion over the coming decade, according to the White House’s chief economist — a projection at variance with independent analysis.】

item.title: AQR 数年来首次在新美国共同基金中押注杠杆交易
item.description: AQR 资本管理公司（AQR Capital Management）四年来首次推出新的美国共同基金，并将加倍奉行利用杠杆提高收益的策略。【原文：AQR Capital Management is doubling down on a strategy that seeks to juice returns with leverage for its first new US mutual funds in four years.】

item.title: SoFi 重新引入加密货币投资，推出全球汇款服务
item.description: SoFi Technologies 公司计划提供加密货币现货交易和全球汇款服务，以受益于特朗普政府放松监管的政策。【原文：SoFi Technologies Inc. plans to offer crypto spot trading and global remittances to benefit from an ease-up in regulations under the Trump administration.】

item.title: 谷歌推出双子座人工智能编码工具，旨在吸引开发者
item.description: Alphabet Inc.旗下的谷歌公司（Google）正在增加一款人工智能编码助手，以减轻开发人员的工作，其目标是赶上OpenAI的Codex和Anthropic的Claude Code等竞争对手的产品。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google is adding an artificial intelligence coding assistant to to ease the work of developers, aiming to catch up with rival products such as OpenAI’s Codex and Anthropic’s Claude Code.】

item.title: 捷克保持利率不变，价格风险限制更多降息空间
item.description: 捷克央行将利率维持在 2021 年以来的最低水平，因为投资者希望从政策制定者那里获得信号，以了解是否还有进一步放宽政策的空间。【原文：The Czech central bank held interest rates at the lowest level since 2021 as investors seek signals from policymakers on whether there’s room for more policy easing.】

item.title: 捷克国防公司出售 13.3 亿美元垃圾资产以降低债务成本
item.description: 军械制造商捷克斯洛伐克集团（Czechoslovak Group AS）正在推销 13.3 亿美元的垃圾债券，其收益率远低于其上一次举债的收益率，这凸显了信贷资金经理对国防领域投资的追捧。【原文：Armaments maker Czechoslovak Group AS is marketing $1.33 billion of junk bonds at a much lower yield than its last debt foray, highlighting the clamor for defense sector investment among credit money managers.】

item.title: 欧盟放宽援助限制刺激清洁技术投资
item.description: 欧盟放宽了其严格的国家补贴规定，以推动政府投资于更清洁、污染更少的产业，在中国和美国日益激烈的竞争中将欧盟推崇为开拓者。【原文：The European Union relaxed its strict state-aid rules in order to drive government investments into cleaner, less-polluting industries, pitching the bloc as a trailblazer amid increased competition from China and the US.】

item.title: 巴西绿色能源产业正在成为自身成功的牺牲品
item.description:
巴西的风能和太阳能公司一直受到供应链障碍、高借贷成本和输电线路匮乏的影响

。【原文：

Brazilian wind and solar companies have been hit by supply-chain snags, high borrowing costs and a dearth of transmission lines

】

item.title: 乔希-哈里斯的 26North 同意从 Marlin Equity 收购 AVI-SPL
item.description: 26North Partners 已同意从 Marlin Equity Partners 收购视听和通信系统供应商 AVI-SPL Inc.【原文：26North Partners has agreed to acquire a controlling stake in AVI-SPL Inc., a provider of audio-visual and communications systems, from Marlin Equity Partners.】

item.title: 埃及通过向科威特最大银行出售债券获得 10 亿美元资金
item.description: 埃及向科威特最大的银行出售了 10 亿美元的伊斯兰债券，这是这个北非国家在摆脱数十年来最严重的经济危机之后为实现融资多样化而做出的最新努力。【原文：Egypt sold $1 billion in Islamic bonds to Kuwait’s largest bank, the North African nation’s latest bid to diversify financing after emerging from its worst economic crisis in decades.】

item.title: 沃达丰 Idea 寻求 29 亿美元贷款以加强网络建设
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沃达丰理想有限公司（Vodafone Idea Ltd.）正在与贷款机构洽谈，希望借入约 2,500 亿卢比（约合 29 亿美元）的贷款，以加强网络建设，更好地与大型竞争对手竞争。【原文：Vodafone Idea Ltd. is talking to lenders to borrow about 250 billion rupees ($2.9 billion) in loans to bolster its network and compete better with large rivals, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普在伊朗问题上的 "大转弯 "暴露了一个令人不安的石油真相
item.description:
美国总统提醒全世界，他对北京和德黑兰之间贸易的控制极为有限。【原文：

The US president has reminded the world that his control over trade between Beijing and Tehran is extremely limited.

】

item.title: 瑞银将在投资银行业务改革中合并并购与保荐咨询业务
item.description: 作为内部重组的一部分，瑞银集团正在将其并购业务和保荐人咨询业务合并为一个部门。【原文：UBS Group AG is combining its mergers and acquisitions business and sponsor advisory into one unit as part of an internal restructuring.】

item.title: 斥资数十亿美元振兴美国芯片的承诺仍有赖于善变的市场
item.description: 欢迎收看《深度科技》（Tech In Depth），这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，伊恩-金（Ian King）将报道芯片制造商承诺斥资在美国建厂的消息。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Ian King reports on the promises from chipmakers to spend money on manufacturing plants in the US.】
